attributes.description: The ID of the associated application.
Date when this offer was created.
A date_time value if this interview has a precise start time, or a date value if this is an all-day event.
A date_time value if this interview has a precise start time, or a date value if this is an all-day event.
The URL used for video interviews, such as Zoom, Google Meets, or Microsoft Teams.
Array of interviewers. Each must specify a user by user_id, email, or employee_id. Each must include a response status (one of needs_action, declined, tentative, or accepted).
